en.title: Software Engineer
en.description:
While working at the company, I completed software projects for both the company and clients, gaining proficiency in a range of programming languages, frameworks, specifications, and tools.

  • Expert in PHP, including Laravel and PHPUnit. Experienced in writing tests for existing features and using TDD for development.
  • Proficient in JavaScript, including node.js, Vue.js, and TypeScript. Also have experience with React, React Native, fastify, and express servers, and have used low-code solutions such as Strapi for API development.
  • Proficient in using Terraform and Terragrunt to manage infrastructure as code on DigitalOcean and AWS.
  • Experienced in creating Ansible roles and plays for automation purposes.
  • Expert in Docker and Docker Swarm, with experience in creating compose files for various services (e.g. database, mail, Minio) and deploying apps as Docker containers to different environments.
  • Implemented and maintained GitLab CI jobs for building app docker images and deploying to various environments.
  • Gained expertise in REST, GraphQL, monorepos, SEO techniques, and multitenant architecture.
  • Utilized a variety of Amazon Web Services (AWS) services, including S3, EC2, ECR, Lambda, SES, SQS, SNS, and Secret Manager.
  • Integrated third-party services, including messaging, authentication, and online payments, into apps.

en.title: Software Engineering Manager/ Software Architect
en.description:
Managed development of software products for company and clients as software engineer and engineering manager. Currently focused on managerial aspects of software development.

  • Trained new hires on company methodologies, coding standards, and technologies.
  • Supervised and provided guidance to multiple teams serving various clients.
  • Managed software deployments and provided ongoing support to clients.
  • Participated in weekly/biweekly meetings with the clients and collaborated with clients and stakeholders to gather requirements and create functional and technical specifications for software solutions.
  • Participated in weekly/biweekly meetings with clients to review progress, set priorities, clarify requirements, and assign tasks for upcoming sprints.
  • Conducted research and development on potential solutions to create proof of concepts, and presented pros and cons of each solution to the team. Prepared architectural design records (ADRs).
  • Conducted research and development on skeleton apps and in-house packages for reuse in new and existing projects.
  • Managed the hiring process, including reviewing and processing candidates, conducting interviews, and making hiring decisions.
  • Prepared evaluations of team members and developed improvement plans for each team member.
